title: Cinect
description: Cinect is a movie recommendation service, eliminating the pressure of choosing a movie for a group of friends! Using Letterboxd review data from one or more Letterboxd users, a list of desired genres, and a release date filter, Cinect delivers high quality movie recommendations.

title: Automated Notion Assignment Manager
description: Developed an API integration with Canvas to automate fetching of assignment data from courses. Parsed and uploaded the retrieved data to a customized Notion database using the Notion API. Utilized Python and PostgreSQL to ensure efficient and accurate management of assignments.

title: Particle Simulator
description: Simulates particles' orbits around a gravity source. Can render over 20,000 particles. Implemented with C++ and the SFML library

title: Digit Classifier
description: A simple neural network that can classify handwritten digits. Uses the MNIST dataset for the training and test data. Neural network was made from scratch using only Python & Numpy. Can classify handwritten digits with 96.7% accuracy
